page.title: 10Education
page.content: state in all respects. A death of a four and a half year old pupil from chicken pox and croup was recorded. Many were sent home with dirty heads and sore throats and one boy was dismissed for using bad language to the headmaster Mr Gale. Feb 15th the Bellamarsh children have come to school by horse and trap as the water is rising rapidly. Feb 16th the bridge across the River Teign over which the children come to school was washed away by the flood yesterday. The children were given a half holiday to celebrate" Relief of Mafeking." May 18th the Newton Abbot Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals has given three prizes for stories on kindness to animals.
